snippet: Frank Lampard will be England's vice-captain at next month's World Cup in Brazil, manager Roy Hodgson said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Lampard Named England Vice-Captain in Brazil
headline.main: Lampard Named England Vice-Captain in Brazil

lead_paragraph: Frank Lampard will be England's vice-captain at next month's World Cup in Brazil, manager Roy Hodgson said on Sunday.
